name: One String Attached
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021: Joined Together in under 48 hours, One String Attached is an action-tower defence game where you control two unfinished towers stuck together with a string. It features two adorable characters, one rusty string that powers your defences, and waves upon waves of enemies to fend off. Keep your towers close to each other or the string will stretch and snap off! Protect the castle at all costs and kill the crusaders before they make it to the end and your string. "We also apologise if the towers do more harm to each other than the crusaders themselves." - Head of Defence Manufacturing.

 **Controls** Use WASD for the Rook and arrow keys for the Bishop.

 **Credits** One String Attached is made by Ferhanzo and bucketfish for GMTK Game Jam: 2021. Code was done by Ferhanzo, and the art and music were created by bucketfish.
